techmeme.title: ServiceTitan's shares closed up 42.25% at $101 in its Nasdaq debut, giving the company a market cap of about $8.9B after it raised around $625M in its IPO (Jordan Novet/CNBC)
Broadcom reports Q4 revenue up 51% YoY to $14.05B vs. $14.09B est., FY 2024 AI revenue up 220%, expects Q1 revenue just above est.; AVGO jumps 10%+ after hours (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
Vapi, which helps businesses deploy AI-powered voice agents, raised a $20M Series A from Bessemer, Y Combinator, and others, source says at a $130M valuation (Kritika Lamba/Reuters)
Sources: Yahoo laid off or lost through attrition 40 to 50 people from its 200-strong cybersecurity team in 2024, as it outsources its "red team" under new CTO (TechCrunch)
Sublime, which uses AI to scan emails of companies and political campaigns for phishing attacks, raised a $60M Series B, taking its total raised to $93.8M (Jordan Novet/CNBC)
